Events.RelatedDescription: Merged pull request "Update README.md" (#1724) at dotnet/Open-XML-SDK
Events.RelatedBody: Updated reference to OpenXML-Office library that's built on top of OpenXML SDK to provide option to create and manipulate office documents.

Events.RelatedDescription: Merged pull request "Update CHANGELOG.md" (#1761) at dotnet/Open-XML-SDK
Opened issue "Performance degradation for WordprocessingDocument (v3.1.0 vs v2.20.0 vs v2.5.0)" (#1770) at dotnet/Open-XML-SDK
Merged pull request "add c16:uniqueId to several chart complex types" (#1767) at dotnet/Open-XML-SDK
Events.RelatedBody:
Classes for the following complex types receive the `DocumentFormat.OpenXml.Office2016.Drawing.Charts.UniqueID` (`c16:uniqueId`) extension child: 
`CT_DLbl`, `CT_LineSer`, `CT_ScatterSer`, `CT_RadarSer`, `CT_BarSer`, `CT_AreaSer`, `CT_PieSer`, `CT_BubbleSer`, `CT_SurfaceSer`

Events.RelatedDescription: Opened issue "`pictureOptions` and `bubble3D` were removed from some complex types in O15 but not the SDK" (#1769) at dotnet/Open-XML-SDK
Events.RelatedBody:
Need to `[Obsolete]` the following: 

`pictureOptions` from `CT_LineSer`, `CT_RadarSer`, `CT_PieSer`, `CT_BubbleSer` and `CT_SurfaceSer`
`bubble3D` from `CT_SurfaceSer`

these children have been removed in the O15 Office schemas but were never removed from the SDK.

Once obsoleted, they will be marked for deletion in the next major release.

Events.RelatedDescription: Opened issue "Add c16:uniqueId for CT_DPt and CT_LegendEntry" (#1768) at dotnet/Open-XML-SDK
Events.RelatedBody:
Add the following c16:uniqueId extension child patches:

CT_DPtExtensionList/CT_DPtExtension
CT_LegendEntryExtensionList/CT_LegendEntryExtension

These are already in the O16 patch file on the backend, just uncomment for v4.0.
